xapps.name: credit-card
xapps.label: Credit Card
xapps.description: This xApp lets the user enter credit card information
xapps.longDescription: This xApp lets the user enter credit card information.

xapps.name: flight-seat-picker
xapps.label: Flight Seat Picker
xapps.description: This xApp displays an example seat map of an airplane
xapps.longDescription: This xApp displays an example seat map of an airplane.

xapps.name: geo-location
xapps.label: Geo Location
xapps.description: This xApp shows a button that submits the geolocation of the user's device on click
xapps.longDescription: This xApp shows a button that submits the geolocation of the user's device on click.

xapps.name: license-plate-form
xapps.label: License Plate Form
xapps.description: This xApp displays an example form for German license Plates
xapps.longDescription: This xApp displays an example form for German license Plates with a filtered dropdown for cities/municipalities and a regex check before.

xapps.name: signature
xapps.label: Signature
xapps.description: This xApp lets the user sign something
xapps.longDescription: This xApp lets the user sign something.

xapps.name: google-maps-location
xapps.label: Google Maps Location
xapps.description: This xApp shares the current google maps location of a user
xapps.longDescription: This xApp shares the current google maps location of a user.

xapps.name: stripe-payment
xapps.label: Stripe Payment
xapps.description: This xApp displays a Stripe Payment component
xapps.longDescription: This xApp displays a Stripe Payment component that processes a valid payment behind the scenes without sharing sensitive information with Cognigy.AI. As soon as the payment was successfull, Cognigy.AI receives the payment intent object.
